00006 const char *l_unit::mathspacenames[7] = { "veryverythinmathspace",
00007         "verythinmathspace", "thinmathspace", "mediummathspace",
00008         "thickmathspace", "verythickmathspace", "veryverythickmathspace"};
00009 
00010 l_unit::l_unit(bool horizontal)
00011                 : hor(horizontal) {
00012         value = 0;
00013         unit = none;
00014         valid = false;
00015 }
00016 l_unit::l_unit(const float v, Unit u, bool horizontal)
00017         : hor(horizontal), unit(u), value(v) {
00018         valid = true;

00020 void
00021 l_unit::set(const DOMString &s) {
00022         uint len=s.length();
00023         if (len == 0) {
00024                 valid = false;
00025                 return;
00026         }
00027 
00028         // check if tha value is not a named value
00029         for (uint i=0; i<7; ++i) {
00030                 if (s == mathspacenames[i]) {
00031                         unit = name;
00032                         value = i;
00033                         valid = true;
00034                         return;
00035                 }
00036         }
00037         // a unit in mathml can start with a '-', but not with a '+'
00038         bool positive = true;
00039         uint pos=0;
00040 
00041         skipwhitespace(s, pos, len);
00042         if (s[pos] == '-') {
00043                 positive = false;
00044                 ++pos;
00045                 if (pos == len) {
00046                         valid = false;
00047                         return;
00048                 }
00049         }
00050         uint spos = pos;
00051         while (pos < len && (isdigit(s[pos]) || s[pos] == '.')) {
00052                 ++pos;
00053         }
00054         // read numerical value
00055         bool ok;
00056         value = s.substr(spos, pos-spos).toFloat(ok);
00057         if (!ok) {
00058                 valid = false;
00059                 return;
00060         }
00061         skipwhitespace(s, pos, len);
00062         // read unit
00063         if (pos == len) {
00064                 unit = none;
00065                 valid = true;
00066                 return;
00067         }
00068         if (s[pos] == '%') {
00069                 unit = perc;
00070                 value /= 100;
00071         }
00072         if (len - pos < 2) {
00073                 valid = false;
00074                 return;
00075         }
00076         DOMString u = s.substr(pos, 2);
00077         pos += 2;
00078         if (u == "em") unit = em;
00079         else if (u == "ex") unit = ex;
00080         else if (u == "px") unit = px;
00081         else if (u == "in") unit = in;
00082         else if (u == "cm") unit = cm;
00083         else if (u == "mm") unit = mm;
00084         else if (u == "pt") unit = pt;
00085         else if (u == "pc") unit = pc;
00086         skipwhitespace(s, pos, len);
00087         valid = pos == len;
00088         return;
00089 }
00090 void
00091 l_unit::set(const float f, Unit u) {
00092         value = f;
00093         unit = u;
00094 }
00095 void
00096 l_unit::skipwhitespace(const DOMString &s, uint &pos, uint len) const {
00097         while (pos < len && whitespace(s[pos])) {
00098                 ++pos;
00099         }
00100 }
00101 bool
00102 l_unit::whitespace(ushort u) const {
00103         return u == 0x0020 || u == 0x0009 || u == 0x000A || u == 0x000D;
00104 }
00105 bool
00106 l_unit::validate() const {
00107         return valid;
00108 }
00109 /* Return the conversion factor for the conversion from unit u to pixels */
00110 float
00111 l_unit::getConvFact(const MML::Attributes *a, Unit u) const {
00112         switch (u) {
00113         case em:
00114                 return a->p->em();
00115         case ex:
00116                 return a->p->ex();
00117         case px:
00118                 return 1;
00119         case in:
00120                 return a->p->dpi(hor);
00121         case cm:
00122                 return a->p->dpi(hor)/2.54;
00123         case mm:
00124                 return a->p->dpi(hor)/25.4;
00125         case pt:
00126                 return a->p->dpi(hor)/72;
00127         case pc:
00128                 return a->p->dpi(hor)/6;
00129         default:
00130                 return 1;
00131         }
00132 }
00133 float
00134 l_unit::get(const MML::Attributes *a, Unit u) const {
00135         float nv = value*getConvFact(a, unit)/getConvFact(a, u);
00136         return nv;
00137 }
00138 float
00139 l_unit::getNamedSpace(const MML::Attributes *a, MathSpace ms) const {
00140         switch (ms) {
00141         case VERYVERYTHINMATHSPACE:
00142                 return a->veryverythinmathspace().get(a, px);
00143         case VERYTHINMATHSPACE:
00144                 return a->verythinmathspace().get(a, px);
00145         case THINMATHSPACE:
00146                 return a->thinmathspace().get(a, px);
00147         case MEDIUMMATHSPACE:
00148                 return a->mediummathspace().get(a, px);
00149         case THICKMATHSPACE:
00150                 return a->thickmathspace().get(a, px);
00151         case VERYTHICKMATHSPACE:
00152                 return a->verythickmathspace().get(a, px);
00153         case VERYVERYTHICKMATHSPACE:
00154                 return a->veryverythickmathspace().get(a, px);
00155         }
00156         return 0;
00157 }
00158 float
00159 l_unit::get(const MML::Attributes *a, const l_unit &relto) const {
00160         float r = 1;
00161         if (relto.unit != none && relto.unit != perc) {
00162                 r = relto.get(a);
00163         }
00164         switch (unit) {
00165         case perc:
00166                 return r*value/100;
00167         case none: // since there is no unit, the value must be relative
00168                 return r*value;
00169         case name:
00170                 return getNamedSpace(a, MathSpace(value));
00171         default:
00172                 float factor = getConvFact(a, unit);
00173                 return value*factor;
00174         }
00175 }
00176 bool
00177 operator!=(const v_unit &u1, const v_unit &u2) {
00178         return u1.getValue() != u2.getValue()
00179                 || u1.getUnit() != u2.getUnit();
00180 }
